short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Readmax Switch enables you to seamlessly toggle the Readmax extension on and off directly from the Readmax website.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Readmax Switch extension is developed for ease of our end users to manage our existing Readmax extension to enable disable.
